title: Acquis Consulting Group Adds Shimon Avish to Expand Meetings Management Practice
text:
NEW YORK, Acquis Consulting Group is pleased to announce Shimon Avish has joined the firm as Principal and Head of the Strategic Meetings Management practice. In this role, Avish will oversee the expansion of Acquis Consulting Group's offerings in the area of meetings management.
Avish has been in the industry for over 20 years, holding roles with American Express Consulting, American Express Meetings & Events, BCD Meetings & Events, and his own firm, Shimon Avish Consulting. Avish has led major initiatives to design and build global strategic meetings management and congress management programs for Fortune 500 companies, and he is an expert in risk and compliance management, program assessment, design, and implementation, and change management.
Acquis is a boutique management consulting firm based in New York City, specializing in strategy and implementation. Since its founding in 1998, Acquis has developed a deep domain expertise across multiple industry verticals and business functions, extending to corporate travel and meetings management. Acquis has experience with key aspects of global meetings management, and is able to manage the integration of these activities into existing corporate travel, payment, expense, and organizational workflows while providing the strategic, project, implementation, and change management to their clients. Acquis approaches all client engagements with their company mantra, People First, in mind to meet the expectations and organizational requirements of their clients with highly customized and thoughtful solutions. Please contact acquis@acquisconsulting.com for more information.
